price: 13. Kaadu Samuuduuy, Nabii Luut maraa kee Garbo mari (Nabii Shuqeybi mara kinnuk) farmoytit dirabboyseh, toh inkih koroosannuu kee diraabal gaaboowe mara.
arabic: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوۡمُ لُوطٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ لۡـَٔيۡكَةِۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wathamūdu waqawmu lūṭin wa-aṣḥābu al'aykati ulāika al-aḥzābu
